report:
Premise: Girl wearing purple jacket rides a red snow sled.

a girl is riding a sled.

Premise: A tan dog is standing in front of some plants.

a dog and some plants

Premise: Woman wearing black snow gear walking down a snow covered slope.

The woman is wearing a bikini.

Premise: A little child in red pants and a black kimino like top is walking.

The little child is walking down a dirt road.

Premise: A man wearing a black coat walking past a fence.

A man in a black coat is walking past his property.

Premise: A man with short, styled hair using an electric razor to trim his facial hair.

A man is crying while starring at a mirror.\

Premise: A man dressed in blue jeans, green shirt and red vest putting up Christmas stockings.

a man is preparing for christmas

Premise: it looks to be a glass maker heating up some glass to make something while visitors in the background watch him

A glass maker is making something and has an audience.

Premise: A person holding a bike a sunny day.

A person outside in the sun with their bike

Premise: The man in the red shirt and flowery tie is sitting on a bus by the window.

A man is sitting on the bus.
